title: 18 Killed, 42 Injured In Series Of Suicide Attacks In Nigeria
content: At least 18 people were killed and 19 seriously wounded in a string of suicide attacks in northeastern Nigeria on Saturday, emergency services said.
summary: At least 18 people were killed and 19 seriously wounded in a string of suicide attacks in northeastern Nigeria on Saturday, emergency services said.

title: Russian Strike On Ukraine Kills 7, Zelensky Asks Allies For More Weapons
content: A Russian strike on the south Ukrainian town of Vilniansk killed at least seven people, Kyiv said, in an attack that came hours after Russia said a Ukrainian drone killed five people on its border village.
summary: A Russian strike on the south Ukrainian town of Vilniansk killed at least seven people, Kyiv said, in an attack that came hours after Russia said a Ukrainian drone killed five people on its border village.

title: Rishi Sunak, Wife Offer Prayers At London Temple Ahead Of UK Elections
content: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and wife Akshata Murty on the last weekend of the general election campaign prayed at London's iconic BAPS Swaminarayan Mandir, popularly known as Neasden Temple.
summary: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and wife Akshata Murty on the last weekend of the general election campaign prayed at London's iconic BAPS Swaminarayan Mandir, popularly known as Neasden Temple.

title: "Nothing New, No Real Progress": Hamas Official On Gaza Ceasefire Deal
content: A senior Palestinian Hamas official said Saturday in Beirut that negotiations for an agreement with Israel on a Gaza ceasefire and hostage release deal had not made any progress.
summary: A senior Palestinian Hamas official said Saturday in Beirut that negotiations for an agreement with Israel on a Gaza ceasefire and hostage release deal had not made any progress.

title: 40 Killed, Over 200 Injured In Israeli Attacks On Gaza In 24 Hours
content: At least 40 Palestinians were killed and 224 others injured in Israeli attacks across the besieged Gaza Strip over the past 24 hours, according to health authorities controlled by Hamas.
summary: At least 40 Palestinians were killed and 224 others injured in Israeli attacks across the besieged Gaza Strip over the past 24 hours, according to health authorities controlled by Hamas.

title: Man Attacks Israeli Embassy In Serbia With Crossbow, Shot Dead By Cops
content: A Serbian police officer on Saturday killed a man who shot him in the neck with a crossbow in front of the Israeli embassy in Belgrade, in what the prime minister called a "terrorist act".
summary: A Serbian police officer on Saturday killed a man who shot him in the neck with a crossbow in front of the Israeli embassy in Belgrade, in what the prime minister called a "terrorist act".

title: Israel Minister Says Iran "Deserves To Be Destroyed" For War Threat
content: Israeli Foreign Minister Israel Katz said on Saturday that Iran's message of an "obliterating war" made it worthy of destruction.
summary: Israeli Foreign Minister Israel Katz said on Saturday that Iran's message of an "obliterating war" made it worthy of destruction.

title: Iran Warns Israel Of "Obliterating" War If Lebanon Attacked
content: Iran on Saturday warned that "all Resistance Fronts", a grouping of Iran and its regional allies, would confront Israel if it attacks Lebanon.
summary: Iran on Saturday warned that "all Resistance Fronts", a grouping of Iran and its regional allies, would confront Israel if it attacks Lebanon.

title: 5 ISIS Bombs Found Hidden In Iconic Iraq Mosque: UN Agency
content: A United Nations agency said it has discovered five bombs in a wall of Mosul's iconic Al-Nuri mosque, planted years ago by Islamic State group jihadists, during restoration work in the northern Iraqi city.
summary: A United Nations agency said it has discovered five bombs in a wall of Mosul's iconic Al-Nuri mosque, planted years ago by Islamic State group jihadists, during restoration work in the northern Iraqi city.

title: 2 Priests Among Prisoners Exchanged Between Ukraine, Russia
content: Ukraine and Russia said Saturday that priests were among the dozens of captured soldiers and civilians they had exchanged earlier this week.
summary: Ukraine and Russia said Saturday that priests were among the dozens of captured soldiers and civilians they had exchanged earlier this week.

title: 'Hannibal The Cannibal' Locked In Fortress Cell Behind 17 Doors: Report
content: Robert Maudsley, dubbed "Hannibal the Cannibal," has been held in solitary confinement at Wakefield Prison for 45 years due to his extreme danger, locked behind 17 steel doors resembling conditions akin to Hannibal Lecter.
summary: Robert Maudsley, dubbed "Hannibal the Cannibal," has been held in solitary confinement at Wakefield Prison for 45 years due to his extreme danger, locked behind 17 steel doors resembling conditions akin to Hannibal Lecter.

title: Explained: How New UK Prime Minister Will Be Elected
content: The upcoming general elections will shape the composition of the House of Commons, ultimately determining the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.
summary: The upcoming general elections will shape the composition of the House of Commons, ultimately determining the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

title: Stop Interference In Judiciary By Agencies Like ISI: Pak Court To PM Office
content: A top Pakistani court on Saturday directed the Prime Minister's Office to issue directives to the country's powerful intelligence agencies, including ISI, and ask them not to approach any judge or member of their staff to obtain favourable verdicts.
summary: A top Pakistani court on Saturday directed the Prime Minister's Office to issue directives to the country's powerful intelligence agencies, including ISI, and ask them not to approach any judge or member of their staff to obtain favourable verdicts.

title: How Nigel Farage Is Using TikTok To Challenge Rishi Sunak In UK Polls
content: The 60-year-old leader has become an unlikely breakout star on the app, with a five-second clip of him lip-synching Eminem's "Guess Who's Back?" pulling in over eight million views.Â
summary: The 60-year-old leader has become an unlikely breakout star on the app, with a five-second clip of him lip-synching Eminem's "Guess Who's Back?" pulling in over eight million views.

title: Instagram Suffer Major Outage Globally, Including In India
content: Meta-owned Instagram on Saturday suffered a major outage globally, including in India, as thousands of users were unable to load Reels and access other options.
summary: Meta-owned Instagram on Saturday suffered a major outage globally, including in India, as thousands of users were unable to load Reels and access other options.

title: Turbulence At Washington Post With Pressure For Profit From Jeff Bezos
content: The prestigious Washington Post is in crisis, with pressure on from owner Jeff Bezos to change its money-losing ways.
summary: The prestigious Washington Post is in crisis, with pressure on from owner Jeff Bezos to change its money-losing ways.

title: Joe Biden Shares Stage With Elton John To Celebrate LGBTQ Milestone
content: US President Joe Biden paid tribute to LGBTQ pioneers and British music legend Elton John performed his hits as the pair inaugurated on Friday a historical site in New York City celebrating the 1969 "Stonewall riots".
summary: US President Joe Biden paid tribute to LGBTQ pioneers and British music legend Elton John performed his hits as the pair inaugurated on Friday a historical site in New York City celebrating the 1969 "Stonewall riots".

title: Can Biden Be Replaced As Democratic Presidential Nominee? Best Way Is...
content: Within minutes of the conclusion of this weeks presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump, it became clear to many that the 81-year-old Biden may not be capable of winning the general election in November.
summary: Within minutes of the conclusion of this weeks presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump, it became clear to many that the 81-year-old Biden may not be capable of winning the general election in November.

title: Michelle Obama To Replace Joe Biden? US Senator's Bold Prediction
content: Former First Lady Michelle Obama will replace President Joe Biden as the Democratic nominee, US Senator Ted Cruz (R-Texas) has predicted.
summary: Former First Lady Michelle Obama will replace President Joe Biden as the Democratic nominee, US Senator Ted Cruz (R-Texas) has predicted.

title: Khamenei Protege, Sole Moderate Neck And Neck In Iran Presidential Race
content: A low-key moderate and a protege of Iran's supreme leader are neck-and-neck in the vote count in snap presidential elections marked by voter apathy over economic hardships and social restrictions.
summary: A low-key moderate and a protege of Iran's supreme leader are neck-and-neck in the vote count in snap presidential elections marked by voter apathy over economic hardships and social restrictions.
